channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [AMQ-2589] NullPointer in MessageDatabase.java on restarting after ungraceful exit
item.description:
If I kill -9 the broker when the broker is heavily loaded with transactional consumers I see the following error when I try and restart the broker.

INFO ManagementContext - JMX consoles can connect to service:jmx:rmi:///jndi/rmi://localhost:2010/jmxrmi
INFO BrokerService - Using Persistence Adapter: org.apache.activemq.store.kahadb.KahaDBPersistenceAdapter@4f3ba2
ERROR BrokerService - Failed to start ActiveMQ JMS Message Broker. Reason: java.lang.NullPointerException
java.lang.NullPointerException

item.summary: NullPointer in MessageDatabase.java on restarting after ungraceful exit

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: resolved in r905349 on trunk and 5.3.1 branch r905376
